content.rendered:
We provide engineering consultancy for installation of fixed and floating platforms including:

Fixed Platforms

  • Offshore lifting study
  • Jacket launching and upending study
  • Topside float-over and mating study
  • Platform foundation study (Mudmat, Pile, Conductor)
  • Structural integrity check during installation
  • Risk Assessment

Floating Structure and Mooring System

  • Design and installation analysis of anchor system (driven pile, suction pile, drag anchor)
  • Single body and multi body mooring analysis including fatigue analysis
  • Mooring hook-up and riser installation analysis
  • Design and installation of SPM
  • Tandem mooring operation for shuttle tanker
  • Risk Assessment

Computer software available in-house

  • “MOSES” by Ultramarine Inc., U.S.A.
  • “ORCAFLEX” by Orcina Limited, United Kingdom
  • “SACS” by Engineering Dynamic Inc. U.S.A.
  • “FEMAP” with “NX NASTRAN” by Siemens
  • “GRLWEAP’ by Pile Dynamic., Cleveland, U.S.A.
  • “AllPile” by CivilTechSoftware, U.S.A
  • “OFFPIPE” by RCM Inc., Houston
  • “DPCAP” by Maritime Research Institute Netherlands
  • “AUTOCAD” by Autodesk Inc., U.S.A.
